headline.main: Pipes and Cigars Banned on Planes; C.A.B. TO BAN CIGARS AND PIPES ON PLANES

docs.abstract: CAB bans smoking of pipes and cigars aboard nation's commercial airliners; takes steps that could lead to prohibition against cigarette smoking; Chmn Alfred Kahn comments (M)

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 22--The Civil Aeronautics Board voted today to ban all cigar and pipe smoking on the nation's commercial airliners and took steps that could eventually prohibit cigarette smoking on aircraft as well.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 22--The Civil Aeronautics Board voted today to ban all cigar and pipe smoking on the nation's commercial airliners and took steps that could eventually prohibit cigarette smoking on aircraft as well.
